1.14.4.1.14.4-1.2.0:
- Wrong op level for `pardon-ip` command fixed.
 - Localizaton for restricted messages added.
 - Hover event with restricred message description added.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.0.1.0:
- Added cooldown and permission modules as not mandatory dependency.
 - Added configuration for native vanilla commands.
 - Implemented all vanilla commands.
 - Permission checking on all vanilla commands.
 - Cooldown checking on all vanilla commands.
 - Added NativeCommandUtils with ability to remove command.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.0.3.1:
- Package name changed to correctly.
 - Added empty line after startup message.
 - Added logo file.
 - Fixed `cr` symbols in mod info.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.0.3.0:
- Bumped kotlin, kotlinx serialization and forge version.
 - Improved build script.
 - Bumped dokka version. 
 - Added compatibility with forge 28.1.X. 
 - Improved logging on mod startup and on forge version incompatibility.
1.14.4.1.14.4-1.0.2.0: - Fixed crash while dependency using CoreAPI.
